description.en: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.ar: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.br: Quando ativado, permite que você visualize o mapa de todas as masmorras por 1 dia.
description.cns: 使用后，1天内可以看到所有副本地图。
description.de: Diese Fackel deckt die Karten von Instanzen und Dungeons auf. (1 Tag)
description.fi: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.fil: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.fr: Torche spéciale qui révèle les cartes des donjons pendant 1 journée.
description.id: Saat diaktifkan, memungkinkan Anda untuk melihat peta semua ruang bawah tanah selama 1 hari.
description.it: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.jp: エリアの地図を表示させるために必要な特殊な松明
description.kr: 지역의 던전 지도를 밝힐 수 있는 특수한 횃불로 1일 동안만 사용이 가능하다.
description.nl: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.pl: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.ru: Факел, способный на 1 день разогнать тьму на картах подземелий и островов.
description.sp: Cuando se activa, te permite ver los mapas de todas las mazmorras durante 1 día.
description.sw: When activated, allows you to view the map of all dungeons for 1 day.
description.th: เมื่อเปิดใช้งาน จะให้คุณดูแผนที่ของดันเจี้ยนทั้งหมดเป็นเวลา 1 วัน
description.tw: 可讀取所有地城地圖的特殊火炬，持續1天。
description.vi: Khi được kích hoạt, cho phép bạn xem bản đồ của tất cả các ngục tối trong 1 ngày.
